name: All Natural Whipped Cocoa Butter *NEW*
description:
Cocoa Butter, An Old Tried and True Product Most Mom's Kept On Hand To Keep Our Skin Soft and To Fade Our Scars Away.

Now Ruby's Soufflé brings it to you in a more luxurious form, WHIPPED !

Most Companies sell lotions and creams, advertising the benefits of cocoa butter, all the while the amount of cocoa butter actually included in the product is minimal, and masked by artificial additives.

Not with Ruby's Soufflé. My whipped Cocoa Butter is made from pure uninterrupted, raw unrefined Cocoa Butter; and that is evident when you get your first whiff of my butter. You'll experience the amazing, chocolate-y, nostalgic smell that cocoa butter naturally has. 

*FUN FACT: Chocolate is made with cocoa butter, which is what gives chocolate it's smell and it's ability to melt as soon as you begin eating it. 

This premium Whipped Cocoa Butter is enhanced with a hint of Jojoba OIl and Coconut Oil. 

For best results, apply to freshly washed damp skin to help seal in the moisture. 

ENJOY !

name: Small Body Butter 3.75 OZ
description:
Our Skin Is the integument of our bodies. This precious organ is the body’s  first line of defense between us and the rest of the world. It endures a lot, So why not treat it with the TLC it deserves ? 
This is where my whipped body butter comes in. This butter is comprised of 3 key ingredients that are exceptionally moisturizing and nourishing, providing vitamins and  healthy fatty acids the skin needs. These ingredients are SHEA BUTTER, SWEET ALMOND OIL AND COCONUT OIL.

This Butter is Whipped to perfection, having a texture as light as an actual whipped cream and melts on contact ...

*ENJOY AND LIVE WELL

name: Ruby's Soufflé XL 16 OZ. NEW!!!
description:
Now,  Your Fav Souffle' ... But Even More Of it ! 

This 16 0z. Jar will last you for what will seem like forever. 
This Is The BEST Deal That Ruby's Soufflé has to offer when you consider the quantity you're receiving relative to the incredibly reasonable price  and superior quality of this rich all natural whipper butter.
